title: POLL | What do you players think about Yuumi?
body: I want to know what you guys think about her

replies.body:
Aesthetically, Riot should be embarrassed. It is one of the most bland and uninspired champs we've gotten in a long time. It's a MAGICAL CAT, throw some flavor in there. Void of any personality. I'm also pretty sure they had some leftover Zoe lines that the voice actor did and just slapped them onto this character because they sound exactly the same. The champion feels very old to play and looks very old in terms of visual quality. 

On a gameplay note, she's boring and everything wrong with the enchanter class made its way onto this champion so it's clear Riot has no idea what they're doing. She feels like a more boring soraka ( how is that even possible?) with 1/3rd the impact on the game. 

Really makes you wonder how something so cheap made it through the cracks, and I'm only left to imagine it was because she's very easy to make skins for.

Kits likely stronger then players give her credit for currently.
I just think that she doesn't belong in this game aesthetically. She looks like a character from a different game.
